publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4538 Ross Finnie: Praising Hermitage Primary School—That the Parliament praises Hermitage Primary School in Helensburgh for the fantastic HM Inspectorate of Education (HMIE) report that it received, with four very good ratings and one excellent rating, and in which the head teacher’s outstanding leadership of improvement and the attainment and achievements of the children were also praised. Supported by: Aileen Campbell, David Stewart, Gil Paterson, Jackie Baillie, Jamie McGrigor
